summary: This is an FBI 302 form documenting a proffer interview conducted pursuant to a proffer agreement with the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York. The interview, which took place on September 5, 2019, involved an individual providing information related to an investigation. The document is a summary of that interview, drafted by an FBI Special Agent.

persons.name: Al Mayo
persons.context: Individual interviewed pursuant to a proffer agreement, providing information to investigators from the U.S. Attorney's Office and FBI.

events.title: Proffer Interview of Al Mayo
events.description: An individual, Al Mayo, was interviewed by investigators from the U.S. Attorney's Office and FBI pursuant to a proffer agreement, providing information related to an investigation.

events.title: FBI 302 Document Drafted
events.description: An FBI Special Agent drafted the FD-302 form summarizing the proffer interview that took place on September 5, 2019.

locations: New York, New York, United States
keyFacts: A proffer interview was conducted with an individual named Al Mayo on September 5, 2019.
The interview was conducted pursuant to a proffer agreement with the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The FBI 302 form summarizing the interview was drafted on December 20, 2019.
The document is related to FBI investigation file 90A-NY-3151227.
The document states it contains neither recommendations nor conclusions of the FBI and its contents are not to be distributed outside the receiving agency.
